WorkItem.Description:
I try to open my template file as:
 var doc = ExcelApp.Workbooks.Open('myTemplate.xltx', false, false);
But, instead  of opening template  Excell create new file, based on template.

doc = ExcelApp.Workbooks.Open(filename: tName, updateLinks: false, readOnly: false, editable: true); - doesn't work  (Error	1	The best overload for 'Open' does not have a parameter named 'editable')

Please, explain how  to open template file (.xltx)
WorkItem.Summary: How to open template file (.xltx) for editing

Comments.Message:
NO doesnt use optional parameters. this is because you can't use named arguments.app.Workbooks.Open(@"C:\Mappe1.xltx",null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null,true);



*Sebastian
